howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Lobe strengthens your mind through science-backed brain games.

gamesShowcase.title:
Stay sharp
with puzzles
gamesShowcase.description: Solve daily puzzles designed to increase problem-solving skills and boost creativity. From memory challenges to language games, train your brain your way.

support.title: Support
support.intro: Welcome to Lobe Support. If you have questions, need assistance, or want to report an issue, you've come to the right place.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: For any support inquiries, please reach out to us via email:
contact.responseTime: We aim to respond to all inquiries within 24-48 hours.

items.question: How do I get started with Lobe?
items.answer: When you first open Lobe, you'll be guided through a simple onboarding process. This will help you set up your profile and introduce you to the app's features. Just follow the on-screen instructions to get started.

items.question: How do I delete my account?
items.answer: You can delete your account in two ways:
list: From the app: Navigate to your profile settings and select the option to delete your account.
Contact us: Send an email requesting account deletion. Please include the email address associated with your account.
items.note: Once your account is deleted, all personal data associated with it will be permanently removed, except where retention is required by law.

items.question: How do I report a bug or issue?
items.answer: If you encounter a bug or experience issues with the app, please email us with a description of the problem, the device you're using, and any steps to reproduce the issue. Screenshots are also helpful.

items.question: How do I manage my subscription?
items.answer: Subscriptions are managed through the App Store. To view, modify, or cancel your subscription:
list: Open the Settings app on your device
Tap your name at the top
Tap "Subscriptions"
Select Lobe to manage your subscription

items.label: Privacy Policy
items.desc: – Learn how we handle your data

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: We value your feedback! If you have suggestions for improving Lobe or ideas for new features, we'd love to hear from you. Send your thoughts to

eula.title: End User License Agreement
intro: This End User License Agreement ("EULA") is a legal agreement between you ("User") and the operator of Lobe, an individual based in Delaware, United States ("Licensor," "we," "us," or "our"), governing your use of the Lobe mobile application ("App").
By downloading, installing, or using the App, you agree to be bound by this EULA. If you do not agree, do not use the App.

content.text: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, revocable license to download and use the App for personal, non-commercial purposes on Apple-branded devices that you own or control, in accordance with Apple's App Store Terms of Service.
All rights not expressly granted to you are reserved by the Licensor.
The App, including but not limited to:

items: Software
Games
Scoring systems
Algorithms
Visual design
User interface
Trademarks and logos

content.text: is owned by the Licensor and protected by intellectual property laws.
This EULA does not transfer ownership of the App or any intellectual property to you.
You agree not to:

items: Copy, modify, or create derivative works of the App
Reverse engineer, decompile, or disassemble the App
Attempt to access source code or internal APIs
Circumvent technical protections or security measures
Rent, lease, sell, sublicense, or redistribute the App
Use the App for unlawful purposes

content.text: Any attempt to do so is a violation of this EULA and may result in termination.
We may:

items: Modify or update the App
Add or remove features or games
Change scoring or functionality
Discontinue the App at any time

content.text: We are not obligated to provide updates or continued availability.
This license is effective until terminated.

items: You may terminate this EULA at any time by deleting the App.
We may terminate this EULA immediately if you violate any provision.
Upon termination, you must stop using the App and delete all copies.

content.text: THE APP IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE."
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW, WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO:

items: MERCHANTABILITY
FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE
ACCURACY OR RELIABILITY OF RESULTS
NON-INFRINGEMENT

content.text: WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT THE APP WILL BE ERROR-FREE, UNINTERRUPTED, OR MEET YOUR EXPECTATIONS.
TO THE MAXIMUM EXTENT PERMITTED BY LAW:

items: WE ARE NOT LIABLE FOR DATA LOSS, PERFORMANCE INACCURACIES, OR THIRD-PARTY FAILURES
WE ARE NOT LIABLE FOR INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES
OUR TOTAL LIABILITY SHALL NOT EXCEED THE AMOUNT PAID BY YOU FOR THE APP, IF ANY, IN THE PRECEDING 12 MONTHS

content.text: Lobe is provided for entertainment and educational purposes only.

items: The App is not a medical device
It does not provide diagnosis, treatment, or medical advice
No claims are made regarding cognitive or health outcomes

content.text: Do not rely on the App for medical or professional decisions.
This EULA is between you and the Licensor, not Apple.
Apple:

items: Is not responsible for the App
Has no obligation to provide support
Is not liable for claims related to the App

content.text: If the App fails to conform to any applicable warranty, you may notify Apple, and Apple may refund the purchase price (if any), but Apple has no further obligation.
Apple and its subsidiaries are third-party beneficiaries of this EULA and may enforce it against you.
This EULA is governed by the laws of the United States, without regard to conflict-of-law principles.
If any provision of this EULA is held unenforceable, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force and effect.
For questions regarding this EULA:

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
intro: This Privacy Policy describes how Lobe (“we,” “us,” or “our”) collects, uses, stores, and protects information when you use the Lobe mobile application (“App”).
By using the App, you agree to the collection and use of information as described in this Privacy Policy.

subsections.title: Information You Provide
list: Email address
Name
Date of birth
Account-related information
Communications with support

subsections.title: Information Collected Automatically
list: Gameplay performance and scores
App usage data and session activity
Device identifiers
Analytics data
Crash reports (via Apple)
subsections.note: We do not intentionally collect IP addresses, though limited technical data may be processed automatically by platform providers.

content.text: We may use cookies or similar tracking technologies to:

items: Understand app usage
Improve performance
Analyze trends

content.text: These technologies are used strictly for analytics and functionality, not advertising.
We use collected information to:

items: Provide and operate the App
Track gameplay progress and performance
Improve games and features
Monitor app stability and crashes
Communicate service-related updates
Provide customer support

content.text: We use trusted third-party service providers, including:

items: Apple App Analytics
RevenueCat
Supabase (data storage and backend infrastructure)

content.text: These providers process data solely on our behalf and under confidentiality obligations.
We do not use advertising tracking (including IDFA) and do not display third-party ads.

items: You retain ownership of your personal data.
We may aggregate and anonymize data for analytics, product improvement, or potential research purposes.
Aggregated data does not identify individual users.
We do not sell personal data.
We may share data only:
With service providers necessary to operate the App
To comply with legal obligations
To protect the rights, safety, or integrity of Lobe
Data is stored in the United States.
Personal data is retained unless otherwise specified.
Upon account deletion, personal data is deleted, except where retention is required by law.

content.text: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:

items: Access your personal data
Correct inaccurate information
Request deletion of your data
Request data portability
Withdraw consent where applicable

content.text: We will respond to verified requests within 30 days, as required by law.
Requests can be submitted by contacting us at the email listed below.

items: Lobe is intended for users 13 years of age and older.
We do not knowingly retain personal data from users under 13.
If data from a user under 13 is discovered, it will be deleted promptly.

content.text: We implement reasonable technical and organizational safeguards to protect your information. However, no system is completely secure, and we cannot guarantee absolute security.

Lobe is available globally. If you access the App outside the United States, you consent to the transfer and processing of your information in the U.S. or other jurisdictions where our service providers operate.
This policy is intended to comply with applicable privacy laws, including GDPR and CCPA/CPRA, where required.
We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time.
Material changes will be communicated through the App or by email.
If you have questions, concerns, or requests regarding privacy:

terms.title: Terms of Service
intro: These Terms of Service (“Terms”) govern your access to and use of the Lobe mobile application (“App”), operated by an individual based in Delaware, United States (“we,” “us,” or “our”).
By downloading, accessing, or using Lobe, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree, do not use the App.

content.text: Lobe is intended for users 13 years of age or older.
By using the App, you represent that you meet this age requirement.
If you are under the age of 18, you represent that you have permission from a parent or legal guardian.

items: An account may be required to access certain features.
You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
You may delete your account at any time using the in-app account deletion feature.
We reserve the right to suspend or terminate accounts at our sole discretion, including for violations of these Terms or misuse of the App.

subsections.title: Subscription Model
list: Lobe is a premium app.
Subscriptions are processed through the Apple App Store, with billing managed via RevenueCat.
Available plans may include weekly, monthly, annual, or lifetime subscriptions.

subsections.title: Free Trials & Auto-Renewal
list: Free trials may be offered at our discretion.
Subscriptions automatically renew unless canceled at least 24 hours before the end of the current billing period.
Subscription management and cancellation are handled through your Apple ID settings.

subsections.title: Refunds
list: Refunds beyond Apple’s standard policies may be granted under reasonable circumstances, at our discretion.
Apple controls final refund eligibility and processing.

subsections.title: Pricing Changes
list: Pricing and subscription terms may change at any time.
Changes will not affect active subscriptions until the next renewal period.

content.text: You agree not to:

items: Reverse engineer, decompile, or attempt to access Lobe’s source code
Circumvent security features or technical protections
Use automated systems (bots, scrapers) to access the App
Interfere with performance tracking, scoring, or analytics systems
Misuse the App in a way that violates applicable law
All games, scoring systems, algorithms, UI/UX, and underlying technology are proprietary and owned by us.
You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the App for personal, non-commercial purposes.
You may not reproduce, redistribute, or exploit App content without permission.

subsections.title: Feedback
subsections.content: Any feedback or suggestions you provide may be used by us without restriction or compensation.

content.text: Your use of Lobe is also governed by our Privacy Policy.

subsections.title: Data Collected
list: Email address
Name
Birthday
Gameplay performance and scores
Device identifiers
Usage analytics

subsections.title: Data Ownership
list: You retain ownership of your personal data.
We may store data unless otherwise specified.
We may aggregate and anonymize data for analytics and product improvement.

subsections.title: Third-Party Services
list: Data may be processed by trusted service providers such as Supabase and analytics tools.
We do not sell personal data.

items: You may share your results publicly at your discretion.
You may request an export of your data, subject to verification.
Lobe is provided for entertainment and educational purposes only.
Lobe is not a medical device
It does not provide diagnosis, treatment, or medical advice
No claims are made regarding cognitive improvement, mental health outcomes, or clinical effectiveness
Do not use Lobe as a substitute for professional medical advice

content.text: We reserve the right to:

items: Modify features
Remove games
Adjust scoring models
Discontinue the App at any time

content.text: We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free availability.

items: You may stop using Lobe at any time.
Upon account deletion or termination, user data will be deleted, except where retention is required by law.
No provisions survive termination except those required by law.

content.text: Lobe is provided “as is” and “as available.”
We disclaim all warranties, including but not limited to:

items: Accuracy of performance metrics
Data reliability or completeness
Fitness for a particular purpose
Availability or uptime

content.text: To the maximum extent permitted by law:

items: We are not liable for data loss, performance inaccuracies, or third-party failures
We are not responsible for misuse of the App
Our total liability is limited to the amount paid by you, if any, in the previous 12 months

content.text: You agree to indemnify and hold us harmless from claims arising from:

items: Your misuse of the App
Violation of these Terms
Violation of applicable law
These Terms are governed by the laws of the United States.
Disputes may be brought in small claims court, where applicable.
You waive the right to participate in class actions or class arbitration.
We may send emails related to product updates, service notices, and promotions.
You may opt out of promotional emails at any time.
Lobe is available to users outside the United States.
You are responsible for compliance with local laws.

content.text: For legal notices or questions regarding these Terms:
